creator: Innovative World
descriptionHtml:
Permanent Delete is an all type of data eraser that permanently deletes files which are never recoverable again not even thumbnails. Permanently delete erases your data completely and protects falling into malicious hands because when you sell your device, some people try to recover your personal data so by this full secure eraser no one will recover your personal data. It deploys quick shredding algorithm which shreds it in seconds and makes your device secure. You can also use it to permanently delete files from your memory card.

Easy Navigation to Secure Delete:
In Permanent delete, you can navigate very easy to find the files and shred it for forever. It has its own file explorer for providing easy access to your gallery and personal data. Eraser also provides strong integration with your device's built-in file manager and you can view your all files which are recently uploaded to your phone gallery. Custom gallery of this wipe files app is very awesome and you get your photos at one place, videos at another.

Custom Gallery:
The uniqueness of Permanently delete and secure eraser is its custom gallery for different types of files. Like you find all your photos in one place and you can easily shred it from there. Same for Video permanent delete and files permanent delete.

No limitations of file type:
You can wipe files without any limitations of type. Just move to that section and tap to secure eraser. If you want to Delete photos permanently then move to photos gallery inside this Secure delete app and tap on the photos that you want to delete permanently. Same for the videos deletion.

Features of Permanent Delete:
• Easy to use file eraser
• Custom gallery for photos, videos, and files
• Permanent delete photos
• Easy navigation
• Secure eraser for videos
• Best UX/UI
• Delete files permanently
• Wipe all data in seconds
• Select multiple files to be shredded

How to use Permanent Delete:
There are three options on the index screen. 1. Photos permanent delete, 2. Videos secure eraser, 3. Wipe files. Move in the desired section and tap on the file. Like if you want to delete photos permanently then move to the photos section and tap on single or select multiple and tap on the shredded button at the bottom and delete it for forever. Permanent Delete is an effort to assure that no one will get your personal data after deletion. Shred it what you want to remove without any limitations of file types. Use FREE and if you like then share this awesome secure eraser with your friends and family.
